plays.text: Penalty to Jeff Toms 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Sheldon Souray
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Hooking Randy Robitaille
Penalty to Randy Robitaille 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Karl Dykhuis assisted by Joe Juneau and Andreas Dackell
Penalty to Gino Odjick 2 minutes for Roughing Jamie Pushor
Goal scored by Michal Rozsival assisted by Jan Hrdina and Randy Robitaille
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Richard Zednik
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for High Sticking Josef Melichar
Penalty to Ian Moran 2 minutes for High Sticking Eric Landry
Penalty to Patrice Brisebois 2 minutes for Roughing Andrew Ference
Penalty to Andrew Ference 2 minutes for Roughing Patrice Brisebois
Penalty to Rick Berry 2 minutes for Roughing Richard Zednik
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for High Sticking Rick Berry served by Donald Audette
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for Roughing Rick Berry
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Hooking Chad Kilger
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Interference Chad Kilger
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Elbowing Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for Holding Rick Berry
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Tripping Joe Juneau
Goal scored by Oleg Petrov assisted by Patrice Brisebois and Doug Gilmour
